name: Lesser Scrag
description: The Lesser Scrag is a chaotic evil aquatic creature characterized by its fearsome physical strength and regenerative abilities when in contact with water.
memorable: Its ability to regenerate while in water makes it a resilient foe, especially vulnerable to acid and fire.
goals: To hunt and ambush prey, taking advantage of its aquatic environment.
relations: Commonly found in water bodies, could be seen with other aquatic monsters.
strengths: Formidable melee combat capabilities, excellent swimming speed, and regeneration in water.
weaknesses: Limited mobility on land, vulnerable to acid and fire damage.
attacks: It can slash with claws and bite, delivering significant melee damage.
most_powerful_ability: Regeneration allows it to recover health at the start of its turn when in water.
additional_information: Swim speed of 40 feet provides great agility in water.
Regeneration hinges on being in contact with water.
Dead only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points without regeneration.
test_queries: aquatic creature that can regenerate in water
chaotic evil monster with powerful attacks
creature that is vulnerable to acid and fire
slow land monster with fast swim speed
